tetra.variant.sword_socket/socket_gold_n: A tiny gold nugget placed in the hilt of a sword, to give it a little extra magical zing.

tetra.variant.single_socket/socket_gold_: A tiny gold nugget placed in the tool, to give it a little extra magical zing.

tetra/schematic/single/head/tetranichema:
Replace the current head with a javelin.
 
Greater weight increases throwing damage.

Replace the current head with a glaive.
 
Greater weight increases weapon damage.

Replace the current head with a long spear.
 
Greater weight reduces swing speed.
tetra/schematic/double/basic_handle/tetr: Replace the current handle with a long handle.
tetra/schematic/sword/tetranichematerial: Replace the current blade with a kopesh.

Replace the current blade with a scimitar.
 
Greater hardness and ductility increases bleeding.
tetra.module.single/tetranichematerials_: An aerodynamic spearhead designed to be thrown.
A heavy, sweeping blade meant to be used by cavalry.
A long spearhead for attacking enemies at a safer distance.
tetra.module.double/tetranichematerials_: A long handle to increase the tool's reach.
tetra.module.sword/tetranichematerials_k: A hooked blade designed to catch shields.
tetra.module.sword/tetranichematerials_s: A curved blade designed for slashing.
tetra.module.crossbow/windlass_limbs.des: Crossbow limbs drawn by a windlass crank. The limbs primarily decide the draw strength of the crossbow.
tetra.module.crossbow/full_bow.name: Full Bow Limbs
tetra.module.crossbow/full_bow.descripti: Crossbow limbs prioritizing size and power above all else.
tetra.module.crossbow/short_limbs.name: Short Limbs
tetra.module.crossbow/short_limbs.descri: Short crossbow limbs are easier to transport and quicker to draw, but have less power.
tetra.module.crossbow/shoulder_stock.des: A stock comfort-fitted to the shoulder, with convenient grips to hold the crossbow steady.
tetra.module.crossbow/tetranichematerial: An attached poison reservoir to dip arrows in before firing. Arrows inflict poison when the crossbow is held in the main hand.
An attached coal pitch reservoir to dip arrows in before firing. Arrows inflict burning when the crossbow is held in the main hand.
tetra.improvement.innate_armor.name: Armor Aura
tetra.improvement.innate_armor.descripti: Projects a field of physical resistance around the wielder.
